# uofg-back-to-top

This component adds a button that appears when the user scrolls down far enough on the page. When this button is pressed, the page will automatically scroll back to the top.

# Usage

Ensure this component is only used once, and is the last element in the page body.

```html
<uofg-back-to-top></uofg-back-to-top>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                 | Type     | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `threshold` | `threshold` | The number of pixels the user has to scroll down before the button appears. | `number` | `50`    |
